name: FungiCausingEncephalitisTestsForFungiCausingEncephalitisNucleicAcidInUnspecifiedSpecimen
title: Fungi [Causing Encephalitis] (Tests for Fungi Causing Encephalitis Nucleic Acid in Unspecified Specimen)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with Encephalitis-causing Fungi),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Encephalitis-causing Fungi),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
